title: What kind of technology was available in ancient China? - Quora

response.answer_text: Magnetic compass,  sophisticated water powered   mills and machines.  Water clocks.  Even a water powered  clock.   Lattitude and Lonigitude,  advanced sailing vessels,  and during the Tang dynasty,  man carrying gliders.  Bamboo pipe for carrying water, waste and even natural gas for fire and lighting.   Rockets.   Our most sophisticated rockets still work the same as the Chinese rockets. The underlying principles have not changed.   They even developed the first versions of inertial seismological instruments.  In word, the Chinese were several light years ahead of the West for a period of time. I wonder what happened to China that it fell behind, so?
